page.title: GStreamer: Tasks
page.body:
In the spirit of the GNOME bounties, but with a lot less money in the bank, we decided to create a list of tasks. If you're a developer who wants to get started using GStreamer and needs a well-defined task to take on, look no further. All of these tasks have enough comments and links to ease you into a small part of the codebase.
If you would like to work on integration between GNOME and GStreamer, check our GNOME tasklist. If you just want to work on GStreamer, check our GStreamer tasklist.
